about_the_game:
Civilian Combatant Pack

This pack offers outfits for fashion-conscious survivors.
A tough outfit fit for a combatant.

Civilian Combatant's Pack includes the following items:

Civilian Combatant's Hat
Civilian Combatant's Tank Top
Civilian Combatant's Gloves
Civilian Combatant's Boots
Civilian Combatant's Dog Tag

How to apply a Skin to Equipment

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore.
